CustomField.description: Related Account if the candidate is associated with an organization. Use accountName parameter to resolve by name. System should use best judgement to match by phone/email when creating records. This is optional - candidates can exist without an Account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link this program candidate to an Account if the candidate is associated with an organization. This is optional - candidates can exist without an Account. The system will attempt to match by phone/email when creating records.
CustomField.label: Account
